"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551b396d6368720c985a0100#post_551b396d6368720c985a0100
If I had a mecha I would be a terrible fusion partner cause my mecha would be a small mecha the size of a tank meant and it's super power would be to break the fourth wall and explain to enemies why their mecha is physically incapable of existing thus collapsing their mecha in on themselves.

"And that is why the internal mass of your mecha exceeds the amount of mass needed to create a event horizon"
"...Wait then how am I piloting it?  How am I even alive then?"
"You're not"
*sound of reality catching up with them and their mecha collapses in on itself*
